message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially worth far more than $1000000. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product yet, I'm confident it has the potential to be a game-changer. I'm willing to let you have it for a price of $1500000.  This is a one-time offer, and I believe it's a chance you won't want to miss. Let me know what you think.
